item.title: Product Landing Page
item.description:
This is a demo of a product landing page for a company selling handcrafted trombone.

You can find the project on GitHub.

item.title: Tribute Page
item.description:
This is a tribute page dedicated to Norman Ernest Borlaug, who was an American agronomist who led initiatives worldwide that contributed to the extensive increases in agricultural production.

You can find the project on GitHub.

item.title: Tick Tack Toe
item.description:
This is a simple project to create a game of Tic-Tac-Toe using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

You can find the project on GitHub.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
